description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. Frighten your friends and family when they least expect it by customizing this game to play freaky sounds and images when and how you want.  You can also trick a friend into playing one of the 'games' to give them a real scare!  Includes a total of 7 shock games.
